headline: Jim Cramer Called Simon Property a “Fabulous” Company
summary: Simon Property Group, Inc. (NYSE:SPG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer offered insights on. A club member asked whether looming interest rate cuts make it a good time to balance an aggressive portfolio by investing in Realty Income or Simon Property Group. Cramer remarked: “Alright, there you go. Right there. Amazon, boom, boom, boom. […]
